[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Polynomial

abbrev omnimath1384_answer : ℚ := sorry
theorem omnimath1384
  (f : ℚ[X]) (hf : f = X^2007 + 17 * X^2006 + 1)
  (hsep : f.Separable)
  (P : ℚ[X]) (hdeg : P.natDegree = 2007)
  (hroots : ∀ (r : ℚ), f.eval r = 0 → P.eval (r + r⁻¹) = 0) :
  P.eval 1 / P.eval (-1) = omnimath1384_answer := by sorry. Enumerated answers: # Using f = X^n + 17 X^{n-1} + 1; computing P(1)/P(-1)
n=2, P(1)/P(-1) ~ 81/64
n=3, P(1)/P(-1) ~ 2312000000000001517467498739719192714800639474338361044044007679076997777/2072000000000000881138240993947389409222312181281142384650717679076997777
